name: UC - Download File(s) Process
description: Free Plug-in under MIT License, which means it is free for everyone to use, no matter if for commercial or private use. The UC Download File(s) process plug-in enables the downloading of one or multiple database-stored BLOBs or CLOBs directly through the browser. You don't have to worry about setting HTTP headers, converting CLOBs to BLOBs, or zipping the files. It's all done for you. Just specify which files to download via a SQL query or a more dynamic PL/SQL code block. Multiple files are zipped automatically, but a single file can optionally be zipped as well.
